Text:
Does anyone have Episode 3? Or better, in 720p?

Hey rekrap, it appears unavailable anywhere in any format BUT I found it on YouTube in 720p.  If you haven't download from there before it's easy as,  just use Firefox and install add-on "Easy Youtube Video Downloader"
